translations.translation: No OverTheBox has been detected on your local network.
that it's connected to the Internet
that you are connected to your control panel on the same network as OverTheBox.
Do you need help with OverTheBox? Click here for the OVH user guides.
Your OverTheBox has been detected on your local network.
{{count}} OverTheBox have been detected on your local network.
To use the device, you have to subscribe to the OVH service.
Follow the steps to configure your OverTheBox
For help configuring your OverTheBox, please see the setup guide here.
You will be automatically charged for your subscription on the monthly billing date, please therefore register a payment method (credit card, Paypal or SEPA account) before you order.
You have to attach this to your service.
Go to your service {{service}} to assign your OverTheBox to it.
Attach your OverTheBox to your service
You have lots of services which are not configured, and we have detected several OverTheBox on your network. Access your services to configure them:
